sentences.en: A flat tire put my bicycle out of commision.
sentences.cn: 车胎跑气使我的自行车无法使用.

sentences.en: As we neared the summit, we were tiring fast.
sentences.cn: 接近山顶时，我们感到越来越累了。

sentences.en: He felt he would never tire of international cricket.
sentences.cn: 他认为自己永远不会对国际板球赛生厌。

sentences.en: He soon began to tire of her.
sentences.cn: 他很快就开始讨厌她了.

sentences.en: Her legs were beginning to tire.
sentences.cn: 她的双腿开始感到累了。

sentences.en: His objective was to tire out the climbers.
sentences.cn: 他的目标是使登山者筋疲力尽。

sentences.en: I never tire of listening to music.
I unluckily had a flat tire on the way here.
sentences.cn: 到这儿来的路上,不幸我的车胎泄气了.

sentences.en: McKee suddenly noticed tire tracks on the bank ahead.
sentences.cn: 麦基突然注意到前方岸边的轮胎痕迹。

sentences.en: Pump the tire up hard before going out on the road.
sentences.cn: 在出去上路之前,要把轮胎打足气.

sentences.en: Sooner or later he may tire of constantly putting himself last.
sentences.cn: 迟早他会厌倦总是把自己排在最后。

sentences.en: Take a spare tire along in case of need.
sentences.cn: 带个备用轮胎去,以备不时之需.

sentences.en: The tire blew out on my way to work.
sentences.cn: 在我开车上班的路上车胎爆裂了.

sentences.en: You will have to block up the wheel of the car to change the tire.
sentences.cn: 换轮胎必须把车轮垫起来.

words.tran_cn: 烦人的，无聊的；令人讨厌的
累人的；麻烦的；无聊的；引起疲劳的
不知疲倦地；不屈不挠地
疲倦；对…腻烦（tire的过去分词形式）
厌倦；使劳累（tire的ing形式）；感到疲倦

phrases.tran_cn: 没精打采；漏了气的车胎
胎压；轮胎气压；轮胎压力
轮胎面；汽车外带；车轮踏面
卡车轮胎；载重汽车轮胎

trans.tran_en: to start to feel tired, or make someone feel tired
to start to feel tired, or make someone feel tired
